title: Underage
creator_credit: Lemon Film, Lizzie Lemon and Kim Longinotto
brief_description: A look at a group of eight teenagers - all in the 15/16 age group - who live in Coventry. The film traces the pressures of growing up without real prospects of employment and it examines the teenagers’ need to prove their identity. Subjects discussed include, racism, glue-sniffing, petty theft and promiscuity.
